languages.text: {n}Мысли тяжело ворочаются в голове, периодически стукаясь о стенки вашего черепа и вызывая вспышки острой боли. Иссохший и скукожившийся язык больно царапается о зубы. Свет... свет — ваш враг.{/n}

{n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мысли тяжело ворочаются в голове, периодически стукаясь о стенки вашего черепа и вызывая вспышки острой боли. Иссохший и скукожившийся язык больно царапается о зубы. Свет... свет — ваш враг.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}无数思绪在你脑海中剧烈翻滚，时不时从脑海中弹射而出，引起一阵阵钻心的剧痛。你的舌头仿佛在嘴里干瘪、萎缩，舌头扫过牙齿时，让你感到疼痛难忍。光亮……光亮就仿佛你的敌人一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无数思绪在你脑海中剧烈翻滚，时不时从脑海中弹射而出，引起一阵阵钻心的剧痛。你的舌头仿佛在嘴里干瘪、猥琐，舌头扫过牙齿时，让你感到疼痛难忍。光亮……光亮就仿佛你的敌人一般。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}頭の中で思考が激しく揺れ動く。周期的に頭蓋骨の内側に跳ね返り、突き刺すような痛みが走る。舌が口の中で乾いて縮こまり、歯に当たって痛みを発する。光…光は敵だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}頭の中で思考が激しく揺れ動く。周期的に頭蓋骨の内側に跳ね返り、突き刺すような痛みが走る。舌が口の中で乾いて縮こまり、歯に当たって痛みを発する。光…光は敵だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los pensamientos retumban por tu cabeza, rebotando en tu cráneo y causando un dolor penetrante. Tienes la lengua seca y marchita y sientes un tremendo dolor cada vez que roza tus dientes. La luz... la luz es tu mayor enemiga en este momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los pensamientos retumban por tu cabeza, rebotando en tu cráneo y causando un dolor penetrante. Tienes la lengua seca y marchita y sientes un tremendo dolor cada vez que roza tus dientes. La luz... la luz es tu mayor enemiga en este momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les pensées se bousculent dans votre tête et ricochent à intervalles réguliers contre les parois de votre crâne, déclenchant de violentes douleurs. À l'intérieur de votre bouche, votre langue vous donne l'impression de s'être desséchée et racle péniblement contre vos dents. La lumière... C'est elle, votre ennemie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les pensées se bousculent dans votre tête et ricochent à intervalles réguliers contre les parois de votre crâne, déclenchant de violentes douleurs. À l'intérieur de votre bouche, votre langue vous donne l'impression de s'être desséchée et racle péniblement contre vos dents. La lumière... C'est elle, votre ennemie.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heftig schießen dir Gedanken durch den Kopf, prallen regelmäßig an deiner Schädelhöhle ab und lösen stechende Schmerzexplosionen aus. Deine Zunge fühlt sich ausgetrocknet und runzelig an, und sie kratzt schmerzhaft an deinen Zähnen. Licht ... Licht ist der Feind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heftig schießen dir Gedanken durch den Kopf, prallen regelmäßig an deiner Schädelhöhle ab und lösen stechende Schmerzexplosionen aus. Deine Zunge fühlt sich ausgetrocknet und runzelig an, und sie kratzt schmerzhaft an deinen Zähnen. Licht ... Licht ist der Feind.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zihninin içindeki düşünceler; şiddetle taklalar atıyor, arada bir kafatasına çarpıp sekiyor ve delici bir acı dalgasını tetikliyorlar. Dilin tamamen kuruyup ağzının içinde büzüşmüş gibi hissettiriyor, dişlerine her değişinde acı veriyor. Işık... Işık senin düşmanın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts tumble violently inside your head, periodically ricocheting off the inside of your skull and triggering bursts of piercing pain. Your tongue feels desiccated and shrivelled in your mouth, and it scrapes painfully against your teeth. Light... Light is the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zihninin içindeki düşünceler şiddetle taklalar atıyor, arada bir kafatasına çarpıp sekiyor ve delici bir acı dalgası tetikliyorlar. Dilin tamamen kurumuş ve ağzının içinde büzüşmüş gibi ve dişlerine her değişinde acı veriyor. Işık... Işık senin düşmanın.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
